short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All-in-One Crypto Tool: multi-chain price and gas tracking, BTC wallet management, and bulk transfers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allet is a powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline your crypto management needs. With Allet, you can easily track multi-chain prices and gas fees, manage your BTC wallets, and perform bulk transfers—all in one convenient tool. Whether you're an experienced trader or a casual user, Allet provides essential features to help you manage your crypto assets efficiently.

Key Features:

- Multi-Chain Price Tracking: Stay updated on the latest crypto prices across multiple chains.
Gas Fee Display: View real-time gas fees on the BTC network, helping you make cost-effective transactions.

- BTC Wallet Management: Keep your BTC wallets organized and secure with Allet’s easy-to-use wallet manager.

- Bulk Transfers: Simplify your transactions with Allet’s one-to-many transfer feature, enabling fast and efficient transfers to multiple wallets.

Download Allet and take control of your crypto assets with ease and confidence.
